main_definition: A 'mat' is a flat, portable cushioning or covering that can serve various purposes such as providing comfort, protection, or improving grip.

meanings_and_examples.example: She wiped her shoes on the rubber mat before entering the house.
John unrolled his blue yoga mat and began his daily stretching routine.
The potted plant was placed on a plastic mat to catch any excess water, keeping the floor dry.
The tennis match took place on a pristine green clay mat.
He laid the new power tools out on their matching metal mats, ready for use.
